description: A React component implementing a 3D endless runner game using @react-three/fiber and @react-three/drei, including game logic, rendering, and UI overlays.

methods.name: useKeyboard
methods.description: Custom hook to track arrow keys and R key presses for game controls.

methods.name: clamp
methods.description: Utility function to constrain a value between min and max.

methods.name: sphereAabbIntersect
methods.description: Function to detect collision between a sphere and an axis-aligned bounding box.

methods.name: Game3D
methods.description: Main React component rendering the 3D game scene, managing game state, and handling game logic.
